main event: A man reported seeing a bright light in the sky that came closer and hovered above his car, casting a white beam of light down on the vehicle. The object then darted up and down and from side to side before shooting straight up and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be about 30 feet in diameter with a red-orange center and a bright white light around the outside.
The object hovered about 50-60 feet above the road and was no more than 30-40 feet off the ground.
The entire incident lasted about a minute and a half.
After the sighting, the witness said his car motor seemed to be affected.
Another witness reported seeing a bright light flash across the sky, hover, and then shoot straight up and disappear.
sighted object: a bright light object that hovered and maneuvered above a car
witnesses: Reverend Melvin J. Parsons, A.C. Mancine
